Articles.Content:
Hello all! I found KSP through a Youtube video walk-about...you know how it goes, you search for a how-to on fixing your dishwasher and fourteen 'Hmm, that's an interesting video' links later you're watching things explode.

SO I've been playing around for about a month now, and I'm severely addicted. I've started DLing mods now, and I just made a 10 orbit launch, and I'm pondering whether or not to mention realistic damage effects for the VAB and launch pad would be COOL, because I've hit those huge fuel tanks like six times now and haven't created a fresh new bay in the coastline....

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
